description: Try our easy to follow Hummus Dipper Pots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hummus Dipper Pots Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: veggie sticks (such as carrot, celery, cucumber, capsicum )

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas, lemon juice, tahini, garlic, spices, a pinch of salt and 3 tbs water in a food processor and pulse to combine.
With the motor running, slowly drizzle in the olive oil and process until smooth and creamy.
Divide hummus between 6 small jars, fill with veggie sticks, secure the lids and refrigerate until needed.
